Description: Implement user authentication system with role-based access control

Description: Create users table with fields: id email password_hash name role created_at updated_at

Summary: Implement JWT token generation and validation

Build login form with email password and remember me option

Description: GET/PUT /api/users/profile for profile retrieval and updates
Create profile page with editable fields for name email preferences
As an admin I want to manage user roles so that I can control access to features

Description: Create middleware to check user roles and permissions for protected routes

Summary: Create role management UI for admins
Description: Admin panel to view and modify user roles

Description: Create tables: curricula topics subtopics learning_objectives with relationships

Show curriculum structure topics learning path and metadata

Description: POST/PUT/DELETE /api/curricula for curriculum creation and editing

Implement system to manage learning sessions with AI interactions
As a learner I want my learning sessions to be tracked so that I can resume where I left off
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN user starts topic WHEN session begins THEN session is created; GIVEN active session WHEN user pauses THEN state is saved; GIVEN paused session WHEN user returns THEN they can resume

Description: Create learning_sessions table with user_id topic_id model status timestamps
POST/GET/PUT /api/sessions for create retrieve and update operations
Track session status: in_progress paused completed abandoned

Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN AI conversation WHEN messages exchanged THEN they are persisted; GIVEN session history WHEN retrieved THEN chronological order is maintained

Description: Create conversations table with session_id role content model timestamp
Save each user and assistant message to database during session

Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN ongoing session WHEN AI responds THEN previous messages are included in context; GIVEN context limit WHEN exceeded THEN intelligent truncation is applied

Description: Manage conversation history within model token limits using sliding window
When context is too long create summary of earlier conversation
Build interactive learning experiences with AI guidance and exploration
As a learner I want AI to guide me through topics so that I learn systematically

Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN current topic WHEN user asks tangential question THEN AI validates relevance; GIVEN related concept WHEN explored THEN connection to main topic is maintained; GIVEN exploration WHEN complete THEN user can return to guided path

Description: Use AI to determine if question is related to current topic before answering
UI control to switch between guided and exploratory modes
Track and display how exploratory concepts relate to main learning path

Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN programming topic WHEN learning THEN code examples are provided; GIVEN code example WHEN user modifies THEN they can run and see results; GIVEN code execution WHEN errors occur THEN AI explains the issue

Description: Use AI to suggest relevant documentation articles videos based on context
